rules.text: Crossed the river at a ford upstream. Avoided the old mill and bridge entirely. The old man's intel proved valuable.
Attacked the bandits at the bridge. Had the element of surprise. Killed several, including a big man with an axe. The survivors fled.
The big man I killed was Rodrik - someone's brother. A man named Garrett. The dying bandit's warning: he's coming for me.
Tried to bargain with the bandits. Offered my sword. They took everything and beat me. Should have attacked when I had the chance.
Walked into an ambush at the bridge. They took my horse and sword. Gave them the ring to avoid a beating. Left with nothing but my life.
Walked into an ambush. They took my horse and sword, then beat me. But I hid the ring in my boot. They didn't find it.
Walked into an ambush at the bridge. Had nothing of value. They beat me anyway for sport. Walked to Millbrook with nothing.
Reached Millbrook. A modest settlement in the valley. A place to rest and figure out what comes next.
